title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, June 28, 2013
byline: Queena Kim, Mark Garrison and Chau Tu
teaser: School's out, which means millions of American kids are off at camp, pitching tents, roasting marshmallows -- or, hacking. The online security firm ESET runs a camp for young hackers that encourages them to use their skills for good, not evil. And Amazon rolls out a new platform for fan fiction.
